project1.title: Dog Days
project1.description: Dog Days is the final project for the front-end class of NSS. It was created as a one stop app for a dog owner to be able to track a dogâ€™s exercise, feeding, bathroom, and grooming.
project1.technologiesUsed: Javascript, SCSS, Firebase, Axios, React, Reactstrap, MomentJS, Version Control with Github

project2.title: Penterest
project2.description: The sixth exercise at NSS. The objective of the exercise was to create a site similar to Pinterest. This project was our introduction to Firebase, Axios, and CRUD.
project2.technologiesUsed: Javascript, Firebase, Axios, JQuery, Version Control with Github

project3.title: Bozo University
project3.description: Group project to create admin panel for a clown college. Thanks Michael, Nick, and Matt. I was responsible for the Lessons page.
project3.technologiesUsed: Javascript, Firebase, Axios, JQuery, Version Control with Github

project4.title: Sweatys
